aboutSection.title: About me
aboutSection.subTitle: Passionate Full Stack Development student at UTN Buenos Aires and self-taught. Specialized in MERN Stack, I constantly seek opportunities to improve and apply my knowledge in programming. Ready to start as a trainee!

footerSection.footerTitle: Thank you for visiting my portfolio!
footerSection.footerText: Feel free to contact me for any questions or job opportunities

titleSection.title: Let's talk!
titleSection.subtitle: Seeking my first opportunity in the world of development

cardtext.title: Introduction
cardtext.text: Hi, I'm Limber Martinez, I live in Dortmund, Germany. I am of Latin American origin, I speak Spanish, German (B1), and English (B1). Love traveling and self-taught learning in development. Excited to start my career in programming

cardtext.title: This Website
cardtext.text: Developed a frontend site using HTML, CSS, JS React, and Bootstrap. Faced challenges like reusing cards and icons, sending emails through EmailJS's SMTP API, and language-switching using library i18n

cardtext.title: E-commerce
cardtext.text: Ongoing ecommerce frontend project using HTML, CSS, JS React, Bootstrap. Displays products with reusable cards, imports using Mercado Libre's API, and authenticates users through Firebase

cardtext.title: E-commerce
cardtext.text: Ongoing Angular ecommerce project, using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap. Includes Home, Articles via API, login, registration, shopping list, and orders. Backend in planning stages. Responsive design and optimization expected
